name: !ProtoCompiler-gRPCCppPlugin
summary: The gRPC ProtoC plugin generates C++ files from .proto services.
description:
This podspec only downloads the gRPC protoc plugin so that local pods generating protos can use
it in their invocation of protoc, as part of their prepare_command.

prepare_command:
set -e
if [ ! -f grpc_cpp_plugin ]; then
  ../../tools/bazel build //src/compiler:grpc_cpp_plugin
fi
